acolyte.name: Acolyte

feature.name: Shelter of the Faithful
feature.description: You and your companions can receive free healing and care at temples of your faith.

traits: I idolize a particular hero of my faith.
I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies.
bonds: I would die to recover an ancient relic.
I owe my life to the priest who took me in.
flaws: I put too much trust in those who wield power within my temple.

criminal.name: Criminal

feature.name: Criminal Contact
feature.description: You have a reliable contact in the criminal underworld.

traits: I always have a plan for when things go wrong.
I am incredibly slow to trust.
bonds: I'm trying to pay off an old debt.
Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made.
flaws: When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.
I turn tail and run when things look bad.

folkHero.name: Folk Hero

feature.name: Rustic Hospitality
feature.description: Common folk will shelter you from the law (but not danger).

traits: I judge people by their actions, not words.
If someone is in trouble, I'm always ready to help.
bonds: I have a family, but I have no idea where they are.
I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
flaws: I have a weakness for the vices of the city.
Secretly, I believe things would be better if I were a tyrant.

noble.name: Noble

feature.name: Position of Privilege
feature.description: People assume you have the right to be wherever you are. Common folk accommodate you.

traits: My eloquent flattery makes everyone I talk to feel important.
Despite my noble birth, I do not place myself above other folk.
bonds: I will face any challenge to win the approval of my family.
My house's alliance with another noble family must be sustained.
flaws: I secretly believe everyone is beneath me.
I hide a truly scandalous secret.

soldier.name: Soldier
equipment: Bone dice or deck of cards

feature.name: Military Rank
feature.description: Soldiers loyal to your former military organization recognize your authority.

traits: I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.
bonds: I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
Someone saved my life on the battlefield.
flaws: I made a terrible mistake in battle that cost many lives.
My hatred of my enemies is blind and unreasoning.
